title: Imagination Movers
overview: Rich, Scott, Dave and Smitty are blue-collar brainstormers working hard to solve "Idea Emergencies" in their Idea Warehouse, a clearinghouse of infinite inspirations. Through songs, stories and hijinks, Imagination Movers moves kids to exercise their bodies and brains. Movers motto for everything in life is to "reach high, think big, work hard and have fun!" The Movers themselves are leading by example as they captivate new fans daily with their winning sound and style.
